eu.opends.hmi

Class HMICenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.hmi.HMICenter

  • public class HMICenter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reports collisions with triggers placed in the model to the HMI.
    Author:
    Rafael Math

      static void reportRedTrafficLightCollision(TrafficLight trafficLight, Car car)
      Reports the collision of the car with a traffic light trigger to the HMI if the corresponding traffic light is red.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(Simulator simulator)
        Initializes the HMICenter by setting the simulator field to the current simulator instance.
        Parameters:
        simulator - The simulator

      • getHMIWebSocketServer

        public static HMIWebSocketServer getHMIWebSocketServer()

      • reportTrafficLightCollision

        public static void reportTrafficLightCollision(TrafficLight trafficLight,
                                               Car car)
        Reports the collision of the car with a traffic light trigger to the HMI. By the given car and traffic light position a permanent distance update will be sent to the HMI screen.
        Parameters:
        trafficLight - traffic light object
        car - user-controlled car of simulator

      • reportRedTrafficLightCollision

        public static void reportRedTrafficLightCollision(TrafficLight trafficLight,
                                                  Car car)
        Reports the collision of the car with a traffic light trigger to the HMI if the corresponding traffic light is red. By the given car and traffic light position a permanent distance update will be sent to the HMI screen in order to cancel the presentation, if the car passes the traffic light
        Parameters:
        trafficLight - traffic light object
        car - user-controlled car of simulator

        public static void close()
